docs.summary: ID and type of the buyer (member type only for now).

members.name: _id
members.doc: Buyer ID

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Buyer identity type
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"MEMBER"`

docs.summary: Details about the cancellation. Present if order.canceled is true, empty otherwise.

members.name: requestedAt
members.doc: Date when the cancellation request was made

members.name: cause
members.doc:
Cause of the cancellation (e.g. owner, member, payment issues)
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"OWNER_ACTION"`
 + `"MEMBER_ACTION"`
 + `"PAYMENT_FAILURE"`
 + `"PAYMENT_SETUP_FAILURE"`

members.name: cancelAt
members.doc:
Indicates whether immediate or next payment date cancellation was requested when canceling
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"IMMEDIATELY"`
 + `"NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE"`

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of days, months, weeks or years. Currently limited to support only value of 1.

members.name: unit
members.doc:
Days, months, weeks or years.
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"DAY"`
 + `"WEEK"`
 + `"MONTH"`
 + `"YEAR"`

docs.summary: Amount for a single payment (or the whole subscription if it's not a recurring plan)

members.name: value
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string with a period as a decimal separator (e.g., 3.99).

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency code. Must be valid ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., USD).

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the order

members.name: planId
members.doc: ID of the plan that was purchased

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc: ID of the associated subscription in Subscriptions service

members.name: wixPayOrderId
members.doc: ID of the associated Wix Pay order (empty when the order is free)

members.name: buyer
members.doc: ID and type of the buyer (member type only for now).

members.name: planPricing
members.doc: Pricing of the plan at the time of order creation.

members.name: priceDetails
members.doc: Detailed price of one payment cycle.

members.name: orderType
members.doc:
Online or offline
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"ONLINE"`
 + `"OFFLINE"`

members.name: orderStatus
members.doc:
Status of the order (active, expired, etc.)
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"DRAFT"`
 + `"PENDING"`
 + `"ACTIVE"`
 + `"EXPIRED"`
 + `"SUSPENDED"`

members.name: canceled
members.doc: Order has been either canceled or set to cancel at next cycle.

members.name: cancellation
members.doc: Details about the cancellation. Present if order.canceled is true, empty otherwise.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Status of the payment for this this order (updated manually by owner for offline orders, automatically for online orders)
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"PAID"`
 + `"REFUNDED"`
 + `"FAILED"`
 + `"UNPAID"`
 + `"PENDING"`

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Date when the order will become active

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date when the order will expire

members.name: suspensions
members.doc: List of suspension and resumption dates for this order, if there were any

members.name: initialEndDateWithSuspensions
members.doc: Initial order expiration date that was calculated on purchase plus duration of suspensions

members.name: planName
members.doc: Name of the plan at the time of purchase

members.name: planDescription
members.doc: Plan description of the plan at the time of purchase

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date when the order was created (before initiating a payment or any other actions)

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date when the order was last updated (for example, suspended)

docs.summary: Detailed price of one payment cycle.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Price of plan before tax. Monetary amount i.e. 3.99.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for the plan. Empty means no tax was applied.

members.name: total
members.doc: Price after tax is applied. Monetary amount i.e. 4.98. If no tax was applied, this amount matches subtotal.

docs.summary: Pricing of the plan at the time of order creation.

members.name: subscription
members.doc: Plan has recurring payments.

members.name: singlePaymentForDuration
members.doc: Length of one payment cycle.

members.name: singlePaymentUnlimited
members.doc: One time payment, plan is valid until it is canceled.

members.name: price
members.doc: Amount for a single payment (or the whole subscription if it's not a recurring plan)

members.name: freeTrialDays
members.doc: Free trial period for the plan in days. It’s available only for recurring plans.

members.name: cycleDuration
members.doc: Length of one payment cycle.

members.name: cycleCount
members.doc: Number of cycles. Zero for unlimited / until canceled.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the suspension
One of:
 + `"UNDEFINED"`
 + `"ACTIVE"`
 + `"ENDED"`

members.name: startsAt
members.doc: Beginning of the suspended period

members.name: endsAt
members.doc: End of the suspended period (empty when suspension is still active)

docs.summary: Tax applied for the plan. Empty means no tax was applied.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the tax i.e VAT

members.name: includedInPrice
members.doc: Is tax included in the original price or added at checkout

members.name: rate
members.doc: Tax rate in percentage i.e. 24.81%

members.name: amount
members.doc: Monetary amount i.e. 0.99.
